#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
string add( string x , string y ){

   if( y.size() > x.size())
   swap( x , y );

   string ans;
     int rem = 0;
     int index = x.size()-1;
   for(int i = y.size() - 1 ; i >= 0 ; --i ){

      int a = y[i]-'0';
      int b = x[index]-'0';
       rem = a + b + rem;
        if( rem == 2 ){
         rem = 1;
         ans += (0+'0');
        }
        else
        if(rem == 3 ){
         rem = 1;
         ans += (1 + '0');
        }
        else{
        ans += ( rem + '0');
        rem = 0;
        }
        index--;

   }
    while(index > -1 ){

      int a = x[index]-'0';
      rem = rem + a ;
      if(rem == 2 ){
       rem = 1;
       ans += (0+'0');
      }
      else{
      ans += (rem + '0');
      rem = 0;
      }
      index--;
     }
     if(rem)
     ans += (1+'0');
    reverse(ans.begin() , ans.end());
    return ans;


}
string change( ll  k ){

 string y;

  while( k ){

   y += (k%2 + '0');
   k = k / 2;

  }
  reverse( y.begin() , y.end() );

    return y;


}
int main(){


   cin.sync_with_stdio(false);
      int t;
      cin >> t;
       while(t--){


         string x;
         cin >> x;
           ll k;
  cin >> k;
            string y = change( k );


       cout << add( x , y ) << endl;

      }
 return 0;
}
